t = int(raw_input())
while t:
    n = int(raw_input())
    arrival = sorted(map(int, raw_input().split()))
    departure = sorted(map(int, raw_input().split()))
    i,j=0,0
    count = 0
    maximum = 0
    while i<len(arrival) and j<len(departure):
        if arrival[i] < departure[j]:
            count+=1
            i+=1
            maximum = max(maximum, count)
        elif arrival[i] > departure[j]:
            count-=1
            j+=1
        else:
            i+=1
            j+=1
    print maximum
    t-=1
